meta.name: dc:Publisher
meta.content: Watch Tower Bible and Tract Society of Pennsylvania

level1.h1: Psalm 67 To the director; to be accompanied with stringed instruments. A melody. A song.

p.span: God will show us favor and bless us;He will make his face shine upon us (Selah)
2 So that your way may be known throughout the earth,Your acts of salvation among all the nations.
3 Let peoples praise you, O God;Let all the peoples praise you.
4 Let nations rejoice and shout joyfully,For you will judge the peoples fairly. You will guide the nations of the earth. (Selah)
5 Let peoples praise you, O God;Let all the peoples praise you.
6 The earth will give its produce;God, our God, will bless us.
7 God will bless us,And all the ends of the earth will fear him.
